body:
I was running into a checksum error with the old https address on pypi I have swapped it out and updated gitpython to use a newer version. The dependencies were also a little out of date. 

==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/joshuasbrown/spack-stage/spack-stage-py-gitpython-3.1.8-yar5zpp5q3hiamhpckkd6qphpwg2izzu/GitPython-3.1.8.tar.gz
    Expected 49d4f859bda7bd6ef9ce72d9a2cddb6a59dd70f34a18ce409670bc655431c517 but got 080bf8e2cf1a2b907634761c2eaefbe83b69930c94c66ad11b65a8252959f912

/home/joshuasbrown/Software/parthenon-project/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1339, in do_fetch:
       1336        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1337        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1338
  >>   1339        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1340            self.stage.check()
       1341
       1342        self.stage.cache_local()
title: Fix dependencies and https address of gitpython
